title: Trump Issues Original Schedule F Executive Order: Civil Service Protection Elimination
summary: President Trump signs executive order creating Schedule F classification to strip job protections from federal employees in "policy-determining, policy-making, or policy-advocating" positions. This represents systematic effort to convert up to 50,000 career civil servants into at-will political appointees, coordinating with Heritage Foundation Project 2025 planning for comprehensive federal workforce capture.

sources.title: Trump revives executive order aiming to strip some federal employees of civil service protections
